QuestData.Title: Taking the Harbor
QuestData.Description: One of Kael's most elite forces, the Dawnblade army, has been stationed at the Sun's Reach Harbor and Dawnstar Village.$B$BThe harbor is of critical importance to our plans, so any Dawnblade casualties you inflict will be of tremendous help. Kael'thas will rue the day that he turned his back on his people and sided with the Burning Legion.
QuestData.LogDescription: Magister Ilastar at Sun's Reach Armory wants you to slay 6 Dawnblade Summoners, 6 Dawnblade Blood Knights and 3 Dawnblade Marksmen.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you slain the Dawnblade scum, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $c. Kael's armies will falter and once we take the harbor we shall deliver the killing blow!
